resources.string: Nothing says Dungeonmas like red silky hat of Santa the Depth Lord.
What could be more festive than a glowing red nose? And pair of antlers, naturally.

Kobolds were considered but a legend. An ancestors of common gnolls, kobolds dwell in a deep and cold caves. It is believed that their people mastered engineering and machinery long before dwarfs. Yet it is unknown why they disappeared so many years ago...

Kobold icemancers were an elite of their society. A warriors, magicians and most importantly scientist. Ancient icemancers mastered craft of iceshaping creating sophisticated mechanism out of ice and reinforcing them with magic..
A cold spirit is a manifestation of cold, in it\'s purest form. They are a mindless husks, created with magic, acting upon will of their creators or via basic instincts and reflexes.

Amongst all elementals that exist in the dungeons the ice elemental might not be the toughest one, but he can easily be considered one of the most dangerous. It\'s body irradiates cold, slowing down it\'s enemies.
Ice guardians were manufactured by ancient kobolds to protect their caves. Power stored within it\'s core allows Ice guardian to reconstruct itself as long it has enough energy.

Hey... HEY! You are that adventurer thing? Help me out pall, those bloody militarists locked me up. They intended to reactivate an ancient weapon to conquer human things above! I stood against it because it was to dangerous, and they just threw out of a council and chained me to this cage. Please find the key to this cage, in return I\'ll help you out the best I can.

Oh, thank you, thank you so much! How you managed to find the key? You... you destroyed the weapon?! That\'s incredible! You know what, I said I\'ll help you, and I think I know the best way to do it. I\'ll stick with you for a while. * Caged Kobold has turned into a candle
You gotta help me out, buddy
